data.prayer: Father, help the 77 believers in Tiris Zemmour to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tiris Zemmour, Mauritania
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every believer in Tiris Zemmour, Mauritania to do the work of an evangelist with their friends and neighbors.
data.verse: But you, keep your head in all situations, endure hardship, do the work of an evangelist

data.prayer: Father, please remove the barriers that keep the 63,126 who are far from you in Tiris Zemmour, Mauritania from having access to a Bible.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Tiris Zemmour, Mauritania to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Zenaga people. Make the Zenaga people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Tiris Zemmour that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Tiris Zemmour, Mauritania, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Tiris Zemmour with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

location.name: Tiris Zemmour
location.people_groups_list: Masna, Fulani, Fulakunda, Soninke, Korean, Nemadi
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Masna (2,700), Fulani, Fulakunda (51,000), Soninke (237,000), Korean (2,500), Nemadi (500)
